meta.en: Registration to the 3rd Future Symphony Competition has finished. This year, 22 participants from 14 different countries have submitted their orchestral compositions.
meta.lt: Baigėsi registracija į III „Future Symphony“ konkursą. Šiemet orkestrines kompozicijas atsiuntė 22 dalyviai iš 14 skirtingų šalių.

full.en:
Registration to the 3rd Future Symphony Competition has finished. This year, 22 participants from 14 different countries have submitted their orchestral compositions.

All the eligible scores were already sent to the 1st round jury for evaluation.

Members of the jury as well as the 1st round results will be announced on July 20th here and at www.facebook.com/FScompetition.
full.lt:
Baigėsi registracija į III „Future Symphony“ konkursą. Šiemet orkestrines kompozicijas atsiuntė 22 dalyviai iš 14 skirtingų šalių.

Visos nuostatus atitinkančios partitūros jau pateiktos 1-o turo žiuri vertinimui.

Žiuri sudėtis bei 1-o turo rezultatai bus skelbiami liepos 20 d. šioje sveitainėje bei www.facebook.com/FScompetition.
